results.title: Children's Name Charms.. Curved with Heart. Mini Circle Disc. Customize, Personalize, Monogram, Love, Initials, Monogram, Sweet Tag Antiqued
results.description:
This listing is for just one disc. Order more if you like them all!

It allows for a name to be 1-7 letters long, curved along the bottom. 
It also includes an extra stamp, the Classic Heart. Indicate if you want the heart during checkout.
Just like the main photo.

One Antiqued  Circle Disc
1/2" in diameter
7mm jump ring attached

ONE word, date or name
Up to 5 characters across, without heart
Up to 8 characters along bottom, with heart


PICTURED:
♥ JAZZ - 1/8th uppercase "J". 1/16th uppercase "AZZ".
♥ Jayla - 1/8th uppercase "J". 1/16th lowercase "ayla".
♥ lindsay - 1/16th inch lowercase "lindsay".
wyatt - 1/16th inch lowercase "wyatt".
GRIFFIN - 1/16th inch uppercase, curved on bottom edge, no heart

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Use this other listing to order a 1-5 lettered short name without the heart:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/118327944/childrens-name-charms-stylish-round-disc
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

DURING CHECKOUT:
1.) What color metal: copper, silver or gold?
2.) What is the word or date?
3.) What font size do you want?
4.) Heart or no heart stamp?


THE CHARM:
° This listing is for one set of initials, a monogram, one short word, one short name or one date on your charm.
° You can fit up to 5 characters across with 1/16th inch font size. A space or period counts as a character. Two lines are allowed.
° You can fit up to 3 characters across with 1/8th inch font size. A space or period counts as a character. One line is allowed.
* Please note: if you only order numbers they will not look like "lowercase" letters.

THE WORD:
° Check out all the examples in the photos. You'll be able to figure out which font size you like best (depending on word length).
° You can use one name, a date, initials, add a heart between letters. I welcome your creative ideas, but please request similar to what you see in the photos.
° You can mix up font sizes, just be really specific during checkout so I can stamp it like you want.


HAND-STAMPING & ANTIQUING:
° Each charm is hand-stamped and antiqued by me. The letters won't line up perfectly, and each one will be thoroughly unique (like you!). The metals are antiqued along with the stamped letters, each charm will vary in darkness, marks, etc.
° All letters will be in uppercase, the same as shown in the photos.



NOTES:
More quantities can be custom ordered.

Always ask if you have an idea, and I can let you know how we can make it work :)

>>>>> See lots of other charm photos at:
http://www.facebook.com/#!/media/set/?set=a.433303059491.206896.60001389491&type=1


Add a gift box for $1.50 ~ locate the listing in my "charms" section.
http://www.etsy.com/listing/87485110/add-a-gift-box-to-your-existing-order

...............................................................................................................

Please visit my shop policies for more information.

PLEASE NOTE: Your jewelry will look its best and last longer if you do not wear it in the water.
...............................................................................................................

results.title: Laugh Arrow Sign Metal Word Art, Metal Laugh Arrow, Laugh Word Arrow,  Laugh Arrow with Words, Rustic Arrow Decor, Live Laugh Love Cutout
results.description:
We have just moved our shop to Maui! Our current processing times are 2-6 weeks to ship out to accommodate getting our shop set up in our new location. We anticipate being back to our normal 3-8 day processing times shortly. If you need your order sooner, please contact us to see if we can accommodate. We appreciate your business and support while we start this new chapter!




Laugh arrow sign metal word art. Popular design of the split arrow with the word "laugh" in the center. Would go great with our other 2 arrow listings of "live" and "love". 

Overall dimensions are approx.: 13 1/2" wide x 6 1/2 tall.

This laugh word in the middle of a split arrow is made out of 16 gauge steel and a cnc plasma cutter. Hand prepped, sanded and painted.

Available in polished metal, color or clear coat.

Custom sizes are available upon request. Please contact us for more information.

Each piece may have slight variations.

Polished metal pieces are intended to be sold as "projects". To keep from weathering or rusting, metal must be maintained with a lubricant, painted or clear coated.

Most of our pieces are hung with small needles or nails using the existing void spaces as anchor points. This way the art hangs flush with the wall and doesn't take away from the design. If desired, small holes can be added upon request at checkout at no extra charge. 
  
  

 
Need your order quickly? Use the link below to expedite your order:

https://www.etsy.com/SimplyRoyalDesign/listing/550556836

results.title: Live Laugh Love Print, Love Quote, Office Decor, Home Decor, Minimalist Wall Art, Wall Art, Wall Print, Quote, Printable Art, Typography Art
results.description:

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
This listing is for a digital file/instant download only, no item will be shipped to your home unless you purchase our printing services (see below). 

❥ WHAT WILL YOU GET?
- You will receive a high-resolution 8x10" JPEG file (300 dpi). 

- If you want another size, such as 5x7, 11x14, 16x20... Please just leave a message in the “Note to Seller” section during checkout with the size that you would like to receive. I will quickly send your new file for free.

- This listing is for an instant download. No physical item or frame will be shipped to you unless you use our printing services.

❥ PRINT AND MAIL
We can print and mail our prints and signs for you! If you wish to receive a high quality, physical copy of your print, simply add both the print/sign of your choice and the listing "Printing Services" below to your cart.

https://www.etsy.com/listing/556758157/happy-print-market-printing-services?ref=shop_home_active_2

❥ HOW DOES IT WORK?

1. Add the print of your choice to your cart.
2. Purchase the listing.
3. You will be taken to a download page, click "Download Files". 
4. Print:
- Using your home printer. I recommend heavy card stock.
- At a local or online printing shop such as FedEx Kinkos, Staples, Office Max.

Don’t hesitate if you have any questions! ♥

❥ CUSTOMIZATION
If you would like to change the font, or the design, or have something completely customized done for you, please contact me before placing your order. Everything is possible, you just have to ask!

❥ HELP - CUSTOMER SERVICE
You can contact me for any question! I would love to help you with anything you might need! Simply send me a message via Etsy Conversations and I will answer quickly.

results.title: Good Vibes Surf T-Shirt Shaka Surfing Graphics Tee - Unisex Positive Vibes Jersey Tee
results.description:
A great day at the beach surfing is better than a great day doing anything else! Surf lovers know that a good wave day is never taken for granted and always sought after. On the days that you can't make it to the beach or the waves aren't great, you can wear this surf-inspired shirt and feel nostalgic over those surf memories. This shirt is perfect for all surfers, from beginners to advanced surfers, because all surfers know how fun surfing is! Let this shirt remind you of your passion for surfing and inspire you to get back out on the waves!

The "Good Vibes Surf T-Shirt" is a Sunbelt Surf Exclusive! Online only! You’ll never find this in stores.

This updated unisex essential fits like a well-loved favorite. Super soft cotton and excellent quality print make one fall in love with it over and over again.

.: Retail fit
.: 100% Soft cotton (fiber content may vary for different colors)
.: Light fabric (4.2 oz/yd² (142 g/m²))
.: Tear away label
.: Runs true to size

results.title: Live Love Laugh Cell Phone Purse or Water Bottle Purse
results.description:
The purse that you get will be exactly as it is pictured.
Pictures of the black bags are for demo purposes only.  

This is a cute little purse.  It has a zipper pocket on one side and a open pocket on the other side.  Put your money, ID, keys and maybe a lipstick in the zipper pocket. Put your cell phone in the open pocket.  Now you have your essentials in a compact but organized little purse. it's great for a day when you just need a little purse.

Size:

     5 inches wide for the open pocket. This is where you will put your phone.
     4 inches wide for the zipper opening
     7 inches tall     It's okay if your phone is shorter or taller. The width is what matters.

This item is often used as a water bottle purse. Put a water bottle in the open pocket. It will be a lot easier to carry and your hand won't be heating up your water. 

 It's also a handy purse for walking your dog. 

Most sporting events only allow  you to have a "hand"  size purse. This will work for that.  And you can pick from many different patterns to make it personal to you.

Order the shorter strap and it makes a cute little purse for the younger girls.

If you are going to use it for a cell phone purse, measure your phone with the case on. Make sure that you allow for both width and depth.

It comes with a choice of 3 straps. The most popular strap is the 54 inch strap.  This is for adults that want to wear the purse crossbody.  Your hands will be free and its easy to wear.  The second choice is the 36 inch strap. This is great for  the woman that just wants a shorter strap or for younger girls.  The third choice is the 12 inch wristlet.


Background fabrics may vary slightly 

MADE IN THE U.S.A.

results.title: With My Whole Heart for my Whole Life Rustic Wedding Sign Distressed & Antiqued Love Gift We can personalize for free. Date and names etc
results.description:
"With my whole heart for my whole Life." This sign is perfect for the bride and groom as a wedding gift, or can be an anniversary gift, as well as an every day gift for your home. 

This sign measures approximately 7.25 x 12 inches and is on 3/4 inch wood. Signs are shown in Black/Antique White and Burgundy/AntiqueWhite.
We offer several different signs in our shop, so be sure to check our wedding section, so you get the one that is the perfect fit for you. 

• Shipment is generally 3 to 5 business days.

• Hanger attached on backside for easy hanging

• Several other color options available in drop down selection. The first color will be the color of the text & second color will be the background.

• Hand painted laser engraved creation is made to order.

• If we are shipping directly as gift, we can enclose a small handwritten note card, be sure to let us know what you want the card to say in the NOTES section when you order.

• For PERSONALIZED signs or signs you want modified please put the information in the NOTES section when you place your order.

• PROCESS Our handcrafted creations are made using a 7 step process to create a beautiful expression to be cherished for years to come. Two contrasting colors of paint are applied, the design is laser engraved, a fine hairline is applied to the design which gives an awesome touch. The final touches are completed once it goes through our antiquing process with edges distressed.

• COLOR We have a variety of color choices, but if you don't see what you are looking for, please ask  & we will see if we can make it happen for you. Keep in mind when selecting the color options, the first color is the text color, while the second color is the background. See policies for additional questions/clarification on colors.

• Please note these signs are not massed produced but each is unique and no two are exactly the same.

• When working with wood and the antiquing process, each sign has its own warmth and charm. While we try to get the best wood at the lumber yard, sometimes there will be knots or other slight imperfections in the wood, this is considered adding character to the rustic style of this line of our signs. Thanks for stopping by our shop and please do not hesitate to ask any questions.

 
	Check out our other items in our store 
 	https://www.etsy.com/shop/ExpressionsNmore?ref=si_shop

Color Samples can be seen in a variety of sizes at  https://www.expressionsnmore.com/color-examples-rustic-laser-engraved/
